<h3 id="X22744">X(22744) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th BROCARD AND 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^6-2*(b+c)*b*c*a^3+(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)*b*c*a^2-(b^4+b^2*c^2+c^4)*(b-c)^2)  :  :
<p>X(22744) lies on these lines:
{3,9941}, {32,56}, {36,3099}, {55,9997}, {104,9862}, {956,9857}, {958,3096}, {999,11368}, {2896,2975}, {3094,22769}, {3098,3428}, {4475,20999}, {5253,10583}, {8782,22514}, {9301,22765}, {9821,11249}, {9873,10871}, {9878,22565}, {9923,22659}, {9981,22774}, {9982,22773}, {9983,22779}, {9984,22583}, {9985,22781}, {9986,22595}, {9987,22624}, {9993,22753}, {9994,22756}, {9995,22757}, {9996,22758}, {10038,22766}, {10047,22767}, {10873,22759}, {10874,22760}, {10875,22761}, {10876,22762}, {10877,10879}, {10878,22768}, {11386,22479}, {11492,11862}, {11493,11861}, {11885,22755}, {12495,12513}, {12496,18237}, {12497,22770}, {12498,12773}, {12499,22775}, {12500,22777}, {12501,19478}, {12502,22778}, {12503,19159}, {12504,22782}, {13210,22586}, {13235,22560}, {13236,19162}, {13685,22783}, {13743,16123}, {13805,22784}, {13892,22763}, {13946,22764}, {18500,18761}, {19011,19013}, {19012,19014}, {22678,22680}, {22745,22771}, {22746,22772}, {22747,22776}</p>
<p>
X(22744) = {X(3), X(9941)}-harmonic conjugate of X(11494)<br>
